actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to authorize the appropriation of $150 million for research, development, and demonstration projects in urban mass transportation for the fiscal year 1975.

summary.text: Authorizes the appropriation of $150,000,000 for research, development, and demonstration projects in urban mass transportation pursuant to the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 for the fiscal year 1975.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to authorize the appropriation of $150 million for research, development, and demonstration projects in urban mass transportation for the fiscal year 1975.
